resources.string: Welcome! \n\nPlease open settings to set your address.
Or… please add a review if you don\'t like this app!
Are you sure you want to clear the settings for this application?

I am considering adding a feature to allow tracking multiple addresses. This goes beyond my needs, so it will be a premium feature. If this feature interests you, consider buying the premium version now. This is like a "kickstarter"… if I receive enough purchases, I will add the feature and you\'ll be able to use it.
Milwaukee DPW has an online service request form that allows service requests for missed garbage/recycling collection, missing/damaged carts, special collection, street sweeping, etc.
The links to make a service request are below. All requests go through the DPW web site!

The City of Milwaukee can send text notifications with the following information:
 
 • Garbage and recycling pickup
 • Parking restrictions during snow events
 • Street sweeping
 • Amber alerts
 • Aldermanic news
 
 Additionally, you can sign up for email notification of crime activity in your neighborhoods, or in any area of Milwaukee. They include crime categories such as aggravated assault, robbery, burglary, vehicle theft, theft, arson, criminal damage to property and locked vehicle entry.
See this page for more details: \n http://city.milwaukee.gov/enotify

Thanks for installing! The latest changes include:
 
 • FINALLY fixed the updated DPW URL so information is once again available.
 
 All this great information is still available:
 • Information about local recycling
 • Updated About screen
 • Updates to support the latest versions of Android
 
 I like that you are using this app; please consider reviewing or sharing this app with others!
